sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A true report of the late apprehension and imprisonnement of Iohn Nichols minister at Roan and his confession and ansvvers made in the time of his durance there. VVherevnto is added the satisfaction of certaine, that of feare or frailtie haue latly fallen in England. True report of the late apprehension and imprisonnement of John Nichols minister at Roan. Allen, William, 1532-1594.
[6], 34, [2] leaves
By Iohn Fogny, Printed at Rhemes : 1583.
Attributed to William Allen by STC. Appended: An admonition to the reader. Allison & Rogers. Catholic Books, 12. Several leaves stained and torn. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

VVherevnto is added the satisfaction of certaine, that of feare or frailtie haue latly fallen in England. True report of the late apprehension and imprisonnement of John Nichols minister at Roan. Allen, William, 1532-1594.
[6], 34, [2] leaves
By Iohn Fogny, Printed at Rhemes : 1583.
Attributed to William Allen by STC. Appended: An admonition to the reader. Allison & Rogers. Catholic Books, 12. Several leaves stained and torn. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
